short_description: This function is used to unpivot the data i.e. change the data from dense format to sparse format.
long_description: This function is used to unpivot the data i.e. change the data from dense format to sparse format.

input_tables.name: InputTable
input_tables.rDescription: Specifies the table containing the input data to be unpivoted.
input_tables.description: Specifies the table containing the input data to be unpivoted.

argument_clauses.name: IDColumn
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify the column which contains the input data identifier.
argument_clauses.description: Specify the column which contains the input data identifier.

argument_clauses.name: TargetColumns
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify the columns from the input table which contains the data for unpivoting.
argument_clauses.description: Specify the columns from the input table which contains the data for unpivoting.

argument_clauses.name: AttributeAliasList
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify alternate names for the values in the AttributeName output column.
argument_clauses.description: Specify alternate names for the values in the AttributeName output column.

argument_clauses.name: AttributeColName
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify output column name for AttributeName column.
argument_clauses.description: Specify output column name for AttributeName column.

argument_clauses.name: ValueColName
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify output column name for AttributeValue column.
argument_clauses.description: Specify output column name for AttributeValue column.

argument_clauses.name: Accumulate
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the input table columns to copy to the output table. By default, the function copies no input table columns to the output table.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the input table columns to copy to the output table. By default, the function copies no input table columns to the output table.

argument_clauses.name: IncludeNulls
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify whether or not to include nulls in the transformation.
argument_clauses.description: Specify whether or not to include nulls in the transformation.

argument_clauses.name: InputTypes
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify true, if instead of one column for all attribute values, need multiple columns corresponding to data type groups.
argument_clauses.description: Specify true, if instead of one column for all attribute values, need multiple columns corresponding to data type groups.

argument_clauses.name: OutputVarchar
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify true if there is a need to output the AttributeValue column in varchar format irrespective of it's data type.
argument_clauses.description: Specify true if there is a need to output the AttributeValue column in varchar format irrespective of it's data type.

argument_clauses.name: IndexedAttribute
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify true if there is a need to output the column indexes instead of column names in AttributeName column
argument_clauses.description: Specify true if there is a need to output the column indexes instead of column names in AttributeName column

argument_clauses.name: IncludeDataTypes
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify true to output the original data type name.
argument_clauses.description: Specify true to output the original data type name.
